io.spine.server.delivery

Class ShardedStorage<I,M,R extends ReadRequest<I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.storage.AbstractStorage<I,M,R>
      • io.spine.server.delivery.ShardedStorage<I,M,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of the messages stored
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storage<I,M,R>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InboxStorage

    @SPI
public abstract class ShardedStorage<I,M,R extends ReadRequest<I>>
extends AbstractStorage<I,M,R>
    An abstract class for the RecordStorages, which spread their records across shards.

    • Method Detail

      • readAll

        public abstract Page<M> readAll(io.spine.server.delivery.ShardIndex index)
        Reads the contents of the storage by the given shard index and returns the first page of the results.

        The older items go first.

        Parameters:
        index - the shard index to return the results for
        Returns:
        the first page of the results

      • removeAll

        public abstract void removeAll(java.lang.Iterable<M> messages)
        Removes the passed messages from the storage.

        Does nothing for messages that aren't in the storage already.

        Parameters:
        messages - the messages to remove
